info:

  /readCompany:

            application/json:

            application/json:

          application/json:

        200:
          description: add updateCompany

            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array

  /removeCompany/{id}:

      operationId: removeCompany
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: id of removeCompany
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string

          description: delete removeCompany

components:
  schemas:
    company:
      description: company item
      type: object
      properties:
          id:
            type: string
            example: 6256
          status:
            type: string
            example: azze3ir476t122c69eyx
          legalName:
            type: string
            example: tkgm4yk3x99rxhxmu7hop
          streetAddress:
            type: string
            example: 70qch0lbm2fcu4w9c8f3xb
          locality:
            type: string

          addressRegion:
            type: string
            example: 2xor46jylmor67drc9t6l8
          postalCode:
            type: string

          accressCountry:
            type: string
            example: irodelk9rjnwrrdzcist
          telephone:
            type: string
            example: 585w1nfulzksvyhr86iqnt
          email:
            type: string
            example: z7rh07d9hokbl3i8wqlbee
          dateCreated:
            type: string
            example: cnu4ijeuedii8dsr8eqbqn
          dateUpdated:
            type: string
            example: g9q43y79609h1evckjstym
